mapper.select: select id, productName, productCode, amount, factorageCost,auditCost,manageCost, rate, dayNum, userLevel, isActivated, createdAt, createdBy, updatedAt, updateBy from qt_finacial_product where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
